ValidationRule.description: (Obsolete) Technical Contact is required to save the order
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(Record_Type_Ids__c = "Vlocity OM Order", Record_Type_Ids__c = "Circuit Move Order", Record_Type_Ids__c = "Frontier Direct Calling", Record_Type_Ids__c = "Manual Vlocity Order", Record_Type_Ids__c = "Frontier Direct Calling", Record_Type_Ids__c = "Move Order", Record_Type_Ids__c = "New Order", Record_Type_Ids__c = "Change Order", Record_Type_Ids__c = "Upgrade/Downgrade Order", Record_Type_Ids__c = "UCaaS New Order" ), ISBLANK( Technical_Contact__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Technical Contact is required to save the order
